attributes.action: Regulate control over GCSE England Exam boards
attributes.additional_details: As of recently, AQA have stripped equation sheets from GCSE triple and combined science. There are many equations that we as humans cannot physically remember. We need the equation sheet. You will see a sudden fall in exam results which will negatively impact the country.
attributes.background: We want all exam boards to run their future decisions by a board of government officials.

rejection.details:
Ofqual is already responsible for regulating qualifications, examinations and assessments in England.

If you are concerned that some students will not have access to equation sheets for certain exams, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ensure GCSE students have equation sheets for maths and science exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650047
